name: Echo&Co
description:
Whether you’re delivering free lesson plans to teachers, making it easier for animal rescues to track pets, or helping seniors live and age affordably — the first step to creating a great digital service is understanding and sharing the experience of users.
 
At Echo&Co, we're a creative company that designs and builds digital experiences, products, and services to connect important causes with people who care. We go beyond simple design and technology. We share our talents and expertise with clients to co-create inspiring human-centered journeys, the digital platforms to enable them, and the internal capacity to improve them over time.
The result? Creatively engaged workers and citizens whose actions benefit our lives, communities, and natural world.
In our proudest moments, we've:
Helped social and civic leaders apply digital technology as a powerful force for good.
Worked with public and social sector orgs to build empathetic practices centered around users.
Collaborated with social innovators and digital technologists on shaping the future of social and civic tech. 
Become a woman-owned, certified B Corp.
Every day, we collaborate with clients on:
Discovery and ideation
Service design and product strategy
Branding and storytelling
User research, empathy mapping, and journey modeling
Content strategy and information architecture
Experience, visual, and interaction design
Solution architecture and data modeling
Interface, application, and CMS development
Process, governance, and workflow development
Organizational design and change leadership
Training and coaching creative teams
Let's work together. Connect@echo.co
